description: Zendesk provides customer support software with ticketing, live chat, and knowledge base features, enabling efficient helpdesk operations and customer engagement

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_COUNT_ZENDESK_ORGANIZATIONS
capabilities.description: Count the number of organizations in Zendesk.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_CREATE_ZENDESK_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Tool to create a Zendesk organization. Use when you need to group end users under a shared company profile. Use after confirming the organization name is unique.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_CREATE_ZENDESK_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new user in Zendesk. Use when you need to onboard a user with specific details.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_DESTROY_MANY_ORGANIZATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk delete Zendesk organizations. Use when cleaning up test data or removing obsolete organizations in one call. Returns a job_status payload to track progress.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_GET_ABOUT_ME
capabilities.description: Get information about the owner account in Zendesk.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_GET_ZENDESK_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific organization in Zendesk.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_LIST_ZENDESK_TICKETS
capabilities.description: List Zendesk tickets with pagination and filtering.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_REPLY_ZENDESK_TICKET
capabilities.description: Action to reply to a Zendesk ticket by adding a comment.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_SEARCH_ZENDESK_USERS
capabilities.description: Tool to search Zendesk users by email or name. Use after confirming user identity before ticket creation.

capabilities.name: ZENDESK_UPDATE_ZENDESK_TICKET
capabilities.description: Tool to update a ticket in Zendesk. Use when you need to modify ticket fields like status, priority, or subject after confirming the ticket ID.
